event.title: GNU/LinuxTag 2006, Wiesbaden, Germany
event.body: A little earlier than usual, the biggest yearly expo and conference in Europe about Free Software, since 1996, is approaching again. Do not loose the chance to get informed and updated about Free Software and IT-related developments. Join the event and find out interesting clues and hints about GPLv3 drafting and lot more. FSF Europe will be there, as it was last year, with a booth and interesting talks. Take a look at the following link.
